price: 41. Waxaa ka muuqday fasahaad barriga iyo badda waxay gacmahu dadku kasbadeen darteed (oo denbiyo ah), si uu Alle u dhadhansiiyo qaar ka mid ah waxay faleen, bal inay in u soo noqdaan (Xaqa).
arabic: ظَهَرَ ٱلۡفَسَادُ فِي ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ أَيۡدِي ٱلنَّاسِ لِيُذِيقَهُم بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي عَمِلُواْ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ẓahara al-fasādu fī al-bari wal-baḥri bimā kasabat aydī al-nāsi liyudhīqahum baʿḍa alladhī ʿamilū laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
translations: so that He may let them taste
